settings.content: The number of columns selected will display in order. For instance, if (Three Columns) is selected, only the first 3 entries will be visible. Aspect ratios will need to be adjusted before uploading depending on number of columns displayed.

settings.label: Featured Banner Image 1 (name of uploaded image) example: category1.jpg (do not begin with forward slash).
Featured Banner Name 1 (title text) will appear as entered and be used as alt & title tags for seo.
Link 1 is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured Banner 1 Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).
Featured Banner Image 2 (name of uploaded image) example: category2.jpg (do not begin with forward slash).
Featured Banner Name 2 (title text) will appear as entered and be used as alt & title tags for seo.
Link 2 is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured Banner 2 Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).
Featured Banner Image 3 (name of uploaded image) example: category3.jpg (do not begin with forward slash).
Featured Banner Name 3 (title text) will appear as entered and be used as alt & title tags for seo.
Link 3 is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured Banner 3 Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).
Featured Banner Image 4 (name of uploaded image) example: category4.jpg (do not begin with forward slash).
Featured Banner Name 4 (title text) will appear as entered and be used as alt & title tags for seo.
Link 4 is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured Banner 4 Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).
Featured Banner Image 5 (name of uploaded image) example: category5.jpg (do not begin with forward slash).
Featured Banner Name 5 (title text) will appear as entered and be used as alt & title tags for seo.
Link 5 is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured Banner 5 Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).
Featured SideNav Banner Name (will not appear, for seo use only)
SideNav Banner Link is External (if checked, link will open in new tab).
Featured SideNav Banner Link. Internal example: category-one/sub-category1 (use relative path, no leading forward slash).  External example: http://website.com (use full path).

settings.content: *This will appear everywhere the SideNav is active.
